ComicInfo.Title: Grief More Than a God May Bear; A Call to Arms!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Grief More Than a God May Bear: Thor stops a riot after a boy is mistakenly shot by police and rushed to the clinic where Dr. Blake works.
A Call to Arms!: Thor gathers his Valkyries together to begin his plan to retake Valhalla from Hela. First the Valkyries must find a new body to fill the spot of the missing Brunnhilde.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:23:29. [Issue ID 35661]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Characters: Thor,Lionel Jeffries,Simmons,Mrs. Sayers,Capt. Oakland,Jimmy Sayers (introduction, death)
ComicInfo.Writer: Doug Moench,Mark Gruenwald,Ralph Macchio,Doug Moench,Mark Gruenwald,Ralph Macchio
